text:
- There's over 50 million
Filipinos in the country,
a staggering 71% of Filipino adults

with limited or no access
to banking services.

In an era where digital
tools are at our fingertips,

we recognized the power of
technology to change this.

There's a huge opportunity
to redefine the future

of banking for consumers,
farmers, local businesses
in cities and in remote areas
so everyone can have access

to financial services
to uplift their lives.

Union Bank of The Philippines
is a technology company first.

We're creating a tech-enabled
and agile organization

which includes building a
best-in-class IT infrastructure
to support and sustain our operations.

But we're also working
towards a common goal
and a higher purpose:

introducing new digital
banking solutions based on

our strong commitment to
collaborating with our customers.

Our people are trained to
quickly address changes

in customer behavior
and to learn, unlearn,

and relearn skills to keep
up with the changing times.

We're well on our way to
becoming the first major bank

in the country to be
fully hosted on the cloud,
choosing AWS to run multiple applications.
Scalability and cost optimization,

both hallmarks of cloud-based
IT models, are critical
to helping us realize our vision.
The breadth and depth of AWS enables us

to launch new financial
services more quickly.
We're talking about hyperscale.

Our digital account openings
can exceed a 100,000 a month.

That's tremendous scalability
to operate at this level
and the AWS Cloud enables this.
It's also about process automation,
digitizing manual processes on the cloud

so banking is faster and more
available to our customers,
such as an app that allows customers
to open an account and transact online
without visiting a physical branch.

In 2021, we became the
first publicly listed,

traditional bank to receive
a digital banking license.
At the end of the day, it comes down
to making sure banking is more accessible
and valuable to people and businesses.
By bringing them into the banking fold,

we have no doubt that
the nation's prosperity
will be more universally shared.
(upbeat music)
